subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Smith threw his first interception after 312 passes, the second-longest streak in N.F.L. history, but the Chiefs won their seventh in a row after a 1-5 start.
snippet: Smith threw his first interception after 312 passes, the second-longest streak in N.F.L. history, but the Chiefs won their seventh in a row after a 1-5 start.
